name: Pulpo
concept: Friendly octopus mascot for a developer tool that orchestrates multiple AI coding CLI sessions

prompts.main_mascot: A friendly cartoon octopus mascot named Pulpo, soft purple-violet gradient body (#a78bfa to #7c3aed), large expressive eyes with bright highlights, 8 tentacles each holding a different developer tool — one holds a terminal window, one holds a code bracket </>, one holds a git branch icon, one holds a gear, others gently curling. Minimal flat design, dark background (#0a0a12), soft glow around the body, tech/dev aesthetic, suitable for app icon and brand identity. No text.
prompts.app_icon: Minimal octopus head icon, front-facing, soft purple-violet gradient (#a78bfa to #7c3aed), large friendly eyes with white highlights, rounded dome shape, dark background (#0a0a12), subtle glow effect, flat design, app icon style, 1024x1024, no text, no tentacles visible — just the head as a clean recognizable symbol.
prompts.loading_screen: Cute purple octopus character floating in a dark void (#0a0a12), 8 tentacles gently waving, each tentacle tip glowing softly like a cursor blinking, dreamy atmosphere, subtle particle effects, developer tool aesthetic, the octopus looks focused and determined, minimal style.
prompts.error_state: Cute purple octopus mascot looking confused/worried, one tentacle scratching its head, tangled tentacles, small sweat drop, dark background, flat illustration style, purple-violet colors (#a78bfa to #7c3aed), empathetic and friendly expression.
prompts.success_state: Happy purple octopus mascot celebrating, tentacles raised in joy, one tentacle giving thumbs up, small sparkle effects, dark background (#0a0a12), flat illustration style, purple-violet gradient, warm and encouraging expression.
prompts.onboarding: Friendly purple octopus mascot waving hello with one tentacle, welcoming pose, other tentacles holding small icons (terminal, folder, gear, code), soft glow, dark background, flat minimal style, inviting and approachable.

style_guide.art_style: Flat minimal illustration with soft gradients and subtle glow effects
style_guide.personality: Friendly, capable, slightly playful but professional. Like a helpful senior dev who also has a sense of humor.
do: Keep the design minimal and recognizable at small sizes
Give expressive, large eyes — they're the soul of the character
Show tentacles as useful extensions (holding tools, typing, pointing)
Add subtle glow/light effects for the tech aesthetic
dont: Don't make it look scary or realistic — keep it cute and approachable
Don't use more than 3-4 colors total
Don't add excessive detail — it should work as a 16px favicon too
Don't give it a mouth unless the expression requires it
Don't make tentacles look like snakes or worms

usage_contexts.header_logo: 22px inline SVG, next to 'Pulpo' text — head only, minimal
usage_contexts.onboarding: 56px, welcoming pose — full body with tools
usage_contexts.marketing: Full illustration with all tentacles and tools
